var fetchProductRequest=function fetchProductRequest(){return{type:FETCH_PRODUCT_REQUEST};};export var fetchProductSuccess=function fetchProductSuccess(product){return{type:FETCH_PRODUCT_SUCCESS,payload:product};};export var fetchProductFailure=function function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchProductRequest);productGetAPI(id).then(function(response){var product=response.data.data;if(response.status===200){dispatch(fetchProductSuccess(product));}}).catch(function(error){var errorMsg=error.message;dispatch(fetchProductFailure(errorMsg));});};};export 0:_response$data.data;if(response.status===200){dispatch(fetchProductSuccess(product));onSuccess();}}).catch(function(error){var errorMsg=error.message;dispatch(fetchProductFailure(errorMsg));});};};export var productFavouriteGetAction=function productFavouriteGetAction(){return products=response.data.data;if(response.status===200){dispatch(fetchShopSuccess(products));}}).catch(function(error){var errorMsg=error.message;dispatch(fetchShopFailure(errorMsg));});};};export var shopQuery=function shopQuery(query){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchShopRequest);shopQueryAPI(query).then(function(response){var products=response.data.data;if(response.status===200){dispatch(fetchShopSuccess(products));}}).catch(function(error){var errorMsg=error.message;dispatch(fetchShopFailure(errorMsg));});};};export var
